html:
The Def Jam Recordings artist returns, on November 15, with Petrichor

Def Jam Recordings artist 070 Shake has announced the release date for the new album Petrichor: The musician’s first studio album since 2022’s You Can’t Kill Me is out November 15. Featured on the full-length is “Winter Baby / New Jersey Blues,” which comes with a music video directed by Bennett Watanabe and starring 070 Shake and The Idol’s Lily-Rose Depp. Watch the clip below.

Dave Hamelin, Patrick Krief, and Harry Styles collaborator Tyler Johnson produced “Winter Baby / New Jersey Blues.” Hamelin also worked with 070 Shake as an executive producer on Petrichor.

Revisit the 2020 interview “070 Shake Moves Beyond the Buzz.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013.
